attributes.action: Commit to a full investigation into potential Russian interference.
attributes.additional_details:
Government responsibility is to protect this country from foreign interference. Without knowing what interference has been happening, we cannot protect ourselves. 

It is the duty of every member of the House to commit to allowing an investigation that will establish the facts beyond "The Government actively didn't investigate these allegations".
attributes.background: The Russia Report states that the Government has not to investigate interference by Russian agencies in domestic democratic affairs. This cannot be allowed to continue. We need a full and thorough investigation into the 2015, 2017, 2019 elections, IndyRef, and the Brexit referendum.
